sentences.en: The product provided inadequate vitamin and mineral supplementation.
sentences.cn: 这种产品不能充分补充维生素和矿物质。

sentences.en: This multicenter trial questions the benefits of DHA supplementation during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 这项试验质疑了在孕期服用DHA补充剂的益处。

sentences.en: The safety, efficacy and effective delivery of maternal micronutrient supplementation require further research.
sentences.cn: 母体微量营养素补充的安全性、功效和有效传递需要进一步研究。
